author: kfogel
msg: Fix oversight pointed out by Philip Martin:
* subversion/clients/cmdline/main.c
(svn_cl__cmd_table): Add support for --username and --password to
"propdel", "propedit", "propget", "proplist", and "propset"
commands.
Semi-relatedly, massage the logic from revision 5190:
* subversion/libsvn_wc/providers.c
(get_creds): If a password was requested but not obtained, then
report that we didn't get creds.

author: kfogel
msg: Fix bug reported by Stefan <steveking@gmx.ch>:
small crash report:
When doing an 'svn ls' without giving --username and --password the
client throws an unhandled exception (access violation).  This is
because in libsvn_ra_dav/session.c, line 77 Subversion tries to
make a copy of a string which is NULL (not empty).
One other detail: you have to run svn in a directory with no auth data
(such as a directory that is not a working copy) to stimulate the bug.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/providers.c
(get_creds): Report failure to get creds.  Also, document.

author: gstein
msg: Propagate the group/param information inwards so the diff generation
can check configuration values.
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer.py:
(MailedOutput.generate): use an iteration subpool. pass the group
and params to generate_content().
(StandardOutput.generate): pass group==None, and empty params to
generate_content().
(generate_content): pass the group/params to generate_diff().
(generate_diff): accept the group/params parameters. use them to
determine whether deletion diffs should be suppressed.
(Repository.__init__): fix call to svn.fs.new() -- it asks for a
config hash now. (we pass None)

author: gstein
msg: Add reply-to and the start of deletion suppression. Also tweak the
summary a bit (idea from Sander Striker <striker@apache.org>).
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer.py:
(MailedOutput.start): store any reply_to information
(MailedOutput.mail_headers): if a reply_to was configured, then add
it into the headers.
(generate_list): if props and the content where changed, then print
"contents, props changed" rather than "text, ..."
(generate_diff): begin some logic for suppressing a diff that
deletes a file. some of the info isn't available right here, so we
just hardcode the suppression [for now].

author: kraai
msg: Fix issue 1158.
* doc/book/book/ch06.xml: Change fallback section name from "default"
to "global".
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/client.c
(find_tunnel_agent): Fallback to svn-tunnel-agent in global section.
